modName: Join Dawnguard As a Vampire Fixed
summary: This mod allows you to join the Dawnguard as a vampire. The original mod was by LlywelaGreyleaf but his version made it so the Prophet quest doesn't work. This version has no bugs.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to join the Dawnguard as a vampire. The original mod was by LlywelaGreyleaf but his version made it so the Prophet quest doesn't work. This version fixes that issue, and has no bugs. Its been fully play tested.

Be like Blade or Alucard.

It'll conflict with mods that edit the Dawnguard quest; a New Order.

Requires Dawnguard DLC.
author: GendunDrup and LlywelaGreyleaf

files.name: Join the Dawnguard as a Vampire
